message: I'd like to see some videos of some early startup pitch, mind sharing it with me if you know any resources
Also if you Youtube for Plug and Play Tech Center and/or pitches at iExpo you might be lucky

Here is my "test" pitch: http://dl.dropbox.com/u/11953521/2011-03-29-sc-zapon-sc-PitchPolishSessionPnP.m4v
And this was the "final" pitch: http://dl.dropbox.com/u/11953521/2011-03-31-sc-zapon-iEXPO_Elevatore_PitchPnP.m4v
BTW the license on this stuff if CC-BYSA
awesome...it'd be great actually to share your pitch here too if you have.. so we can evaluate.. although we're not angel investors =)
guys, see here http://www.livestream.com/500startups for startups pitch, live!
